      • isAllowedMove

        public boolean isAllowedMove(jessy.Board board,
                    jessy.Coord coordCurrent,
                    jessy.Coord coordNew)
                      throws jessy.NotAField
        Checks Figure independent constraints like is the destination field empty or is it occupied by opponents figure. Doesn't check how a certain figure can move.
        Parameters:
        board - board model
        coordCurrent -
        coordNew -
        Returns:
        true is move is allowed
        Throws:
        jessy.NotAField

      • canMove

        public abstract boolean canMove(jessy.Board board,
              jessy.Coord coordOld,
              jessy.Coord coordNew)
        Subclass needs to implement this according to movement abillities of the figure.
        Parameters:
        board - board model
        coordOld - current coordinates
        coordNew - new coordinates
        Returns:
        true if successful.
